entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
